title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: The 'Close all saved' feature sometimes fails to close the file even when no changes have been made to it.
EB: It should successfully close the file without prompting for saving, as no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Open the software application.
2. Open a file.
3. Make no changes to the file.
4. Click on the 'Close all saved' option.
